summary: The implementation successfully covers all 13 requirements (REQ-108 through REQ-120) for the localStorage-based authentication system. A new utility file handles user registration and authentication, LoginPage.tsx was rewritten with toggle-based forms using CSS transitions instead of Framer Motion, ProtectedRoute.tsx validates localStorage sessions, and DashboardLayout.tsx displays personalized greetings. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement Framer Motion slide transitions when switching between Sign In and Create Account forms
missing_requirements.reason: The implementation uses CSS transitions (setIsTransitioning with setTimeout) instead of Framer Motion library as explicitly specified in the requirement
